ComicInfo.Title: The Dorks of Hazzardous; How to Make Baseball More Interesting; It Isn't as Bad as it Sounds; The Growing Garbage Problem and What to Do About It; Instant Epitaphs; Poopeye; How to Read Those Travel Ads; Cracked's Peronality Profile Comparisons; Dangerous Barroom Encounters; Cracked Interviews the Insurance King; Shut-Ups!; Great Moments in Technology: Ooga Booga Almost Invents Fire
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.A satire of the television show THE DUKES OF HAZZARD.
A satire of the movie POPEYE.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:39:10. [Issue ID 250540]
